docs.lead_paragraph: SCIENTISTS doing research financed by the tobacco industry believe that cigarette smoking is an addiction and causes a wide range of diseases, a new survey has found. The scientists who conducted the survey said it demonstrated that the scientific community was not divided on the relationship between tobacco and health and that the tobacco industry did not act based on the opinions of scientists whose research it finances.
